meanings.definition: A citrus fruit originating in East Asia.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious yuzu for the first time.
meanings.sent2: The yuzu tree in the garden is full of ripe fruits.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a yuzu and ran up the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as refreshing as a yuzu on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the yuzu stood out among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The aromatic zest or juice of the yuzu fruit.
meanings.sent1: The chef added a hint of yuzu to the salad dressing.
meanings.sent2: The yuzu juice gave the dessert a unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: The air was filled with the sweet scent of yuzu.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a splash of yuzu in a bland conversation.
meanings.sent5: The yuzu zest added a burst of citrus to the dish.
